page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: People in Southill live in cottages, council houses and a few live in mansions.These houses have many different rooms.One of these rooms is a KITCHEN. A kitchen has a sink with hot and cold running water(a place where dirty crockery and cutlery are washed).A kitchen also has an oven where food can be heated and cooked. A grill would be adjoined to the oven where food can be cooked and grilled at the same time.In a kitchen there are cupboards where crockery is stored Another room in the house was a { BEDROOM.In this room people sleep in a bed and have time to themselves. There was bed,a lamp to read by at night and there may also have been a desk. Most houses are quite old although some are fairly new.
